entries.title: Pink Speaks Out After Rumors She Wiped Her Twitter Account Because Of Diddy!
entries.summary:
Pink is clearing the air on where she stands with Diddy! Over the weekend, the pop star was one of many celebrities who appeared to delete her X (Twitter) account following Diddy’s sex trafficking arrest, making fans wonder if she (and the others) were trying to hide something. The timing just looked so bad! Usher [...]

entries.title: Sex Worker Gives Alleged Diddy Sex Tape to Federal Prosecutors
entries.summary: One of Sean "Diddy" Combs' alleged encounters with a sex worker was videotaped, and that tape is now in the hands of federal prosecutors ... TMZ has learned. Sources with direct knowledge tell TMZ ... the male sex worker met with the feds Wednesday…

entries.title: Costco Denies Selling Diddy Baby Oil In Bulk -- They Want Nothing To Do With Him!
entries.summary:
Costco ain’t about to be drug into this Diddy drama without a fight! So you know the 1,000+ bottles of baby oil and lube recovered from the disgraced rapper’s mansions earlier this year?? Well, his lawyer tried to play it all off. On Wednesday, attorney Marc Agnifilo spoke with TMZ about the shocking find, and [...]

entries.title: Health experts left shocked by Elon Musk's glow-up as they reveal how he got so 'chiseled'
entries.summary: Plastic surgeons and weight loss experts told DailyMail.com that tech mogul Elon Musk, 53, has likely used weight loss drugs and plastic surgery to slim down in recent months.

entries.title: Cristin Milioti Looks Back on ’30 Rock’ and Whether That Taylor Swift “Sexy Baby” Lyric Is About Her
entries.summary: Tina Fey’s beloved NBC series 30 Rock hosted one high-profile guest star after another during its seven-season run from 2006-2013. Though she wasn’t a household name on par with movie stars like Matt Damon, Julianne Moore or Salma Hayek, Cristin Milioti delivered a performance on the episode “TGS Hates Women” as Abby Flynn, a nemesis […]
